text.div:
HIV Infection (Tests for HIV Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    25835-0 HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    25841-8 HIV 2 proviral DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    25842-6 HIV 2 proviral DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    34699-9 HIV 2 proviral DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    42917-5 HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    44871-2 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    48023-6 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    49656-2 HIV protease gene mutations by Genotype method
    5017-9 HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    5018-7 HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    53825-6 HIV 1+Hepatitis C virus RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    59052-1 HIV 1+Hepatitis C virus RNA+Hepatitis B virus DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    69353-1 HIV 2 RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    73658-7 HIV 1 subtype in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    73659-5 HIV 2 subtype in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74853-3 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    77368-9 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Semen by NAA with probe detection
    77369-7 HIV 1 RNA [Presence] in Semen by NAA with probe detection
    79379-4 HIV 1 RNA+proviral DNA [Presence] in Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    79380-2 HIV 1 RNA+proviral DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    80688-5 HIV 1 RNA tropism [Identifier] in Plasma
    80689-3 HIV 1 RNA reverse transcriptase and protease and integrase gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Plasma by Sequencing
    80690-1 HIV 1 proviral DNA tropism [Identifier] in Blood mononuclear cells
    80691-9 HIV 1 proviral DNA integrase gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Blood mononuclear cells by Sequencing
    80692-7 HIV 1 proviral DNA reverse transcriptase and protease gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Blood mononuclear cells by Sequencing
    80693-5 HIV 1 proviral DNA reverse transcriptase and protease and integrase gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Blood mononuclear cells by Sequencing
    80695-0 HIV 1 proviral DNA genotype in Mononuclear cells from whole blood
    81122-4 HIV 1 RNA reverse transcriptase and protease gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Sequencing
    85361-4 HIV 1+2 RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    85368-9 HIV 1+2 RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    87962-7 HIV 1 subtype identified in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    88212-6 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    88542-6 HIV 1 RNA integrase gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Sequencing
    88544-2 HIV 1 RNA reverse transcriptase gene mutations detected [Identifier] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Sequencing
    90898-8 HIV 1 proviral DNA reverse transcriptase and protease and integrase gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Blood mononuclear cells by Sequencing
    90899-6 HIV 1 proviral DNA reverse transcriptase and protease gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Blood mononuclear cells by Sequencing
    90901-0 HIV 1 RNA reverse transcriptase and protease and integrase gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Sequencing
    90902-8 HIV 1 RNA reverse transcriptase gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Sequencing
    90903-6 HIV 1 RNA integrase gene [Nucleotide sequence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Sequencing
    9836-8 HIV proviral DNA [Presence] in Blood by Probe with amplification
    9837-6 HIV 1 proviral DNA [Presence] in Blood by Probe with amplification
